name: BatchOptions

properties.name: overrideOpen
properties.description: If true, overrides action open commands.

properties.name: suppressOpen
properties.description: If true, suppresses file open options dialogs.

properties.name: suppressProfile
properties.description: If true, suppresses color profile warnings.

properties.name: destination
properties.description: The type of destination for the processed files.

properties.name: destinationFolder
properties.description: The folder location for the processed files. Valid only when 'destination' = folder.

properties.name: overrideSave
properties.description: If true, overrides save as action steps with the specified destination.

properties.name: fileNaming
properties.description: A list of file naming options. Maximum: 6.

properties.name: startingSerial
properties.description: The starting serial number to use in naming files.

properties.name: windowsCompatible
properties.description: If true, the final file names are Windows compatible.

properties.name: macintoshCompatible
properties.description: If true, the final file names are Macintosh compatible.

properties.name: unixCompatible
properties.description: If true, the final file names are Unix compatible.

properties.name: errorFile
properties.description: The file in which to log errors encountered. To display errors on the screen and stop batch processing when errors occur, leave blank.

description: Options to specify when running a Batch command.
